instructions: Open Settings from the Apps screen or Notifications panel: From the Home screen, swipe up and then find and tap Settings . From the Home screen, tap All apps button Swipe down from the top of the screen and then tap Settings icon Here are some of the basic settings you can change: Tap Network & Internet to configure and manage your network connections. Tap Display & gestures to change the wallpaper, adjust the font and display size, set a screen saver, and more. Tap Sound to change the ringtone, decide if sound and vibration occur when interacting with the phone, set Do not disturb preferences, and more. Tap Security & Location to help secure your phone, choose lock screen preferences, set your location option, and more. Tap an item under Suggestions to check out new or recommended settings to customize.
